You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square. The first row has Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions, and a ▢ in the third position. The second row has Xs in the first and fifth positions, and ▢s in the second, third, and fourth positions. The third row has ▢s in all five positions. The fourth and fifth rows are identical to the first row, with Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions, and a ▢ in the third position.
continue
